text:
Princess Beatrice of York (born Beatrice Elizabeth Mary on 8 August 1988) is a member of the British royal family.
Princess Beatrice was born at The Portland Hospital for Women and Children in London, She is the daughter of Andrew, Duke of York and Sarah, Duchess of York.
When Archie Harrison Mountbatten-Windsor was born on May 6, 2019, the first born son of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, Beatrice became ninth in the line of succession to the British throne.
Beatrice studied history at Goldsmiths, University of London. Princess Beatrice got engaged in September 2019 to Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi. The two got married on 17th July 2020.

annotations.surface_form: line of succession to the British throne
